author: The B1M
description:
Fred Mills takes his deepest dive yet into one of the world's biggest megabuilds.
Download the Straight Arrow News app by clicking here https://www.san.com/b1m to stay informed with unbiased, straight facts 🙌

Full story here - https://www.theb1m.com/video/inside-the-lyon-turin-mega-tunnel

Additional footage and images courtesy of Tunnel Euralpin Lyon Turin (TELT), Euronews, No Comment and VOA.

00:00 Intro
01:16 The Lyon-Turin Route
03:38 The Base Tunnel
05:40 Drill and Blast
07:48 Reinforcement
10:44 The New Railway
12:47 Tunnel Boring Machine
16:48 The Geology
18:07 The Cathedral
21:13 Ventilation
22:53 Opposition and Cost
24:16 Remaining Work
26:10 Conclusion

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/

title: Inside Europe’s New Mega-Tunnel Under The Alps
